properties.areaDesc: Towner; Western Walsh County; Cavalier; Ramsey; Kittson; Pembina
properties.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 12 at 7:29AM CST until February 12 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Grand Forks ND
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, little additional
snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, causing blowing snow
and visibilities less than half a mile. For the Wind Chill
Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as
low as 45 below zero.

* WHERE...Portions of the northern Red River Valley and Devils
Lake region.

* WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 AM this morning to
3 PM CST this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory,
until 11 AM CST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce the
visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning
commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause
frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you
wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.

The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at
dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling
5 1 1 in either state.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
